resources.string:
Government : Unitary parliamentary republic 
 . President : Abdul Hamid 
 . Prime Minister : Sheikh Hasina 
 . House Speaker : Dr. Shrin Choudhory 
 . Chief Justice : Syed Mahmud Hossain

Government : Federal parliamentary republic 
 • President :Ram Nath Kovind 
 • Vice President : Venkaiah Naidu 
 • Prime Minister : Narendra Modi 
 • Chief Justice : Ranjan Gogoi 
 • Speaker of the Lok Sabha : Sumitra Mahajan

Government : Federal parliamentary constitutional republic 
 • President : Arif Alvi 
 • Prime Minister : Imran Khan 
 • Chairman of the Senate : Sadiq Sanjrani 
 • Speaker of the National Assembly : Asad Qaiser 
 • Chief Justice : Asif Saeed Khan Khosa
